data.meta_description: Excellent composition for Coppola's masterpiece. One of the greatest sequels ever made - and enduring vision of corruption and family.
data.text:
More posters

The Godfather: Part II - 1/2 Sheet Hungarian Movie Poster

Excellent composition for Coppola's masterpiece. One of the greatest sequels ever made - and enduring vision of corruption and family.

Original title -

The Godfather: Part II

Year / Country - 1974 / USA

Genre - Crime, Drama

Director - Francis Ford Coppola

Starring -

Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Al Pacino, Robert De Niro

Poster title - Keresztapa 2

Designer - Koppány Simon

Dimensions- More than one size avaiable:

Condition -

Very good. One light horizontal fold mark, tape marks at all four corners, no pin holes, no wrinkles, sharp edges...

Related posters - From the same designer, same director, etc
